== Early life ==

sentences: Early life ==
section: == Early life ==

sentences: Hua Chenyu was born to a wealthy family on February 7, 1990, in the city Shiyan, Hubei.
section: == Early life ==

sentences: His parents divorced when he was two years old and during his childhood he lived with his father, who remarried when he was ten years old.
section: == Early life ==

sentences: He began playing the flute at the age of five and took piano lessons in the fifth grade.
section: == Early life ==

sentences: He wrote his first song at the age of twelve after mastering piano.
section: == Early life ==

sentences: After finishing middle school, Hua moved to Wuhan alone to attend the Fine Arts High School there.
section: == Early life ==

sentences: In 2010, he passed the college entrance examination and entered the Wuhan Conservatory of Music, where he studied pop music vocal performance and became the vocalist of a college rock band called Conseer.
section: == Early life ==

sentences: In 2013, shortly before graduating from conservatory, Hua entered the casting for the television talent contest Super Boy, which was produced by Hunan TV.
section: == Career == | === Super Boy ===

sentences: On his first appearance to the audience, he sang his original "Lyricless Song" that gave him the label of being like a "Martian" for his unique expression.
section: == Career == | === Super Boy ===

sentences: Two of the three judges considered him to be odd or crazy, but after the third judge Laure Shang asked him a few questions and sang a lyricless duet with him, she said "he is a genius!" because "he knew intuitively how to express emotions through music".
section: == Career == | === Super Boy ===

sentences: Due to the recommendation of Laure Shang and his performance of "The Kill", Hua made it past the first round of audition.
section: == Career == | === Super Boy ===

sentences: He later sang with Laure Shang the song "The Star" in the final round on September 27, 2013.

sentences: Chenyu Hua won the 2013 "Super Boy" contest.

sentences: After the competition, Hua was signed to the Chinese record labels EE-Media, where the most of the Super Boy and Super Girl contestants are linked.

sentences: His debut single "Me and Myself" was released in September 2013.
